mapper.select: SELECT c.pid, c.uid, c.statid, s.statNm, s.lat, s.lng, c.location, c.title, c.tf, c.cimgname, c.regdate, u.usertypeid FROM community c INNER JOIN users u ON c.uid=u.id LEFT JOIN station s ON c.statid=s.statId WHERE c.pid=#{pid} ORDER BY c.pid DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET uid=#{uid}, statid=#{statid}, location=#{location}, title=#{title}, tf=#{tf}, cimgname=#{cimgname} WHERE pid=#{pid}
